hero.title: César Garcés
hero.subtitle: Frontend Architecture
hero.description: I build scalable, performant, and maintainable frontend systems.
hero.description2: 8+ years of experience leading teams and defining standards in high-impact applications.

about.title: About
about.paragraph1: With over 8 years of experience as a Frontend Engineer, I've dedicated my career to building web and mobile applications that not only work, but scale and endure.
about.paragraph2: My approach combines clean architecture with performance and user experience. I've led teams in building e-commerce systems handling millions of transactions, real-time dashboards for critical decision-making, and mobile applications with millions of active users.
about.paragraph3: Beyond code, I specialize in defining standards, establishing testing practices, and creating observability systems that enable teams to build with confidence and scale safely.

impact.title: Measurable Impact
impact.description: Every technical decision is aligned with business objectives and success metrics.

leadership.title: Technical Leadership
leadership.description: I build teams, establish standards, and create a culture of excellence in frontend.

scalability.title: Scalability
scalability.description: I design systems that grow without compromising performance or maintainability.

skills.title: Skills &
skills.description: Technologies and tools I master to build world-class frontend systems

experience.title: Professional
experience.description: Journey building high-impact and scale frontend systems

achievements.0: Implemented dynamic UI components using slots and generics in TypeScript, enabling highly reusable and flexible components
achievements.1: Developed an advanced state management system with Zustand, handling drag-and-drop interactions, window positions, and resizable modal states
achievements.2: Designed and optimized a custom pop-up system, allowing window dragging, resizing, stacking, and activation states within a complex UI environment
achievements.3: Integrated a real-time notification system using WebSockets and Zustand, ensuring state persistence across micro frontends

0.scale: Intelligent monitoring system with microfrontends architecture

achievements.0: Configured applications in AWS CodeCommit and CodePipeline
achievements.1: Set up continuous integration and deployment using ECS container architecture in Fargate for backend and Amplify for frontend
achievements.2: Created 3 projects: user, device, and service management for clients; trip and route scheduling; and solution for Concha y Toro to calculate optimal shipping through graphs and calculations
achievements.3: Implemented scalable architecture with automated CI/CD on AWS

1.scale: Multiple enterprise projects with cloud-native architecture

achievements.0: Mentored junior developers, promoting them to mid-level positions
achievements.1: Led knowledge transfer sessions on topics like React Hook Form and React Query
achievements.2: Implemented architecture for dynamic data charts in user dashboards
achievements.3: Proposed and implemented micro frontend and microservices architecture, leading a team of 4 developers and QA-UX/UI

2.scale: Technical and team leadership in high-impact projects

achievements.0: Supported and enhanced customer service application, improving performance and usability
achievements.1: Utilized React.js with TypeScript, styled components, and Formik
achievements.2: Created and supported web pages, contact forms, and modules using HubSpot, Salesforce, HTML5, CSS3, and JavaScript
achievements.3: Experience working with Salesforce Commerce Cloud (SFCC) Frontend Development, building and customizing e-commerce storefronts using SFRA, ISML, JavaScript, HTML, and CSS

3.scale: Enterprise applications with Salesforce integration and e-commerce

achievements.0: Developed and supported customer experience measurement applications
achievements.1: Coordinated design and implementation of various applications, collaborating with project managers and clients
achievements.2: Managed IVR configuration for real-time callbacks via SMS or email

achievements.0: Developed mobile and web applications from design to deployment
achievements.1: Utilized agile methodologies like SCRUM and technologies such as ReactJs, React Native, and MeteorJs
achievements.2: Built and maintained Progressive Web Applications (PWA) leveraging Service Workers, Web App Manifest, and caching strategies
achievements.3: Led full-stack development of scalable solutions from scratch

5.scale: Technology startup with proprietary mobile and web applications

projects.title: Featured
projects.description: Complex systems built with solid architecture and focus on scalability

0.title: Intelligent Monitoring System with Microfrontends
0.problem: Need to build a complex monitoring system with multiple interactive windows, drag-and-drop, and distributed state management across microfrontends.
0.solution: Microfrontends architecture with dynamic components using TypeScript generics, custom pop-up system with Zustand for advanced state management, and WebSockets integration for real-time notifications.

highlights.0: Highly reusable UI components using slots and generics in TypeScript
highlights.1: Advanced state management system with Zustand for drag-and-drop, window positions, and resizable modals
highlights.2: Custom pop-up system with dragging, resizing, stacking, and activation states
highlights.3: Real-time notifications with WebSockets and state persistence across microfrontends

0.architecture: Microfrontends, TypeScript generics, Zustand state management, WebSockets, Component-based architecture
0.impact: Scalable and modular system with reusable components, improving development time by 40%

1.title: Multi-Project Platform on AWS with CI/CD
1.problem: Need to manage multiple enterprise projects (user/device management, trip scheduling, shipping optimization) with automated deployments and cloud-native architecture.
1.solution: Application configuration in AWS CodeCommit and CodePipeline, ECS container architecture in Fargate for backend and Amplify for frontend, with automated CI/CD.

highlights.0: Complete CI/CD configuration in AWS CodeCommit and CodePipeline
highlights.1: ECS container architecture in Fargate for backend and Amplify for frontend
highlights.2: Development of 3 projects: user/device management, trip/route scheduling, and shipping optimization with graphs
highlights.3: Solution for Concha y Toro calculating optimal shipping through graph algorithms

1.architecture: AWS (CodeCommit, CodePipeline, ECS Fargate, Amplify), Automated CI/CD, Container architecture
1.impact: Automated deployments reducing release time from days to hours, scalable cloud-native architecture

2.title: Dashboard System with Dynamic Charts
2.problem: Need for interactive dashboards with dynamic data visualization, scalable architecture, and technical team leadership.
2.solution: Architecture for dynamic data charts in user dashboards, microfrontends and microservices implementation, using React Query and React Hook Form for data and form management.

highlights.0: Architecture implemented for dynamic data charts in user dashboards
highlights.1: Proposed and implemented microfrontends and microservices architecture
highlights.2: Led team of 4 developers and QA-UX/UI using React Query, Axios, Context and React Hook Form
highlights.3: Knowledge transfer sessions on React Hook Form and React Query

2.architecture: Microfrontends, Microservices, React Query, React Hook Form, Axios, Context API
2.impact: Successful mentorship promoting junior developers to mid-level, scalable architecture implemented

3.title: E-commerce with Salesforce Commerce Cloud
3.problem: Need to improve customer service application and build customized e-commerce storefronts with Salesforce integration.
3.solution: Customer service application improvement with React.js and TypeScript, e-commerce storefront development using Salesforce Commerce Cloud (SFCC) with SFRA, ISML, JavaScript, HTML and CSS.

highlights.0: Supported and enhanced customer service application improving performance and usability
highlights.1: Development with React.js, TypeScript, styled components and Formik
highlights.2: Created web pages, contact forms and modules using HubSpot and Salesforce
highlights.3: Experience with Salesforce Commerce Cloud (SFCC) building and customizing e-commerce storefronts

3.architecture: React.js, TypeScript, Salesforce Commerce Cloud (SFCC), SFRA, ISML, HubSpot, Formik, Styled Components
3.impact: High-performance, scalable and SEO-friendly e-commerce storefronts, improving user experience

philosophy.title: Engineering
philosophy.description: Principles that guide every technical and architectural decision

cleanArchitecture.title: Clean Architecture
cleanArchitecture.description: Clear separation of responsibilities, well-defined layers, and unidirectional dependencies. Code should be predictable and easy to navigate.

details.1: Separation of concerns (UI, business logic, data)

performance.title: Performance First
performance.description: Performance is not a late optimization, it's a requirement from design. Every technical decision considers its performance impact.

details.1: Strategic code splitting and lazy loading
details.3: Core Web Vitals as key metrics

maintainability.title: Maintainability
maintainability.description: Code is read more times than it's written. I prioritize clarity, consistency, and documentation over "clever code".

details.4: Continuous refactoring, no technical debt accumulation

testing.title: Testing Culture
testing.description: Tests are not a checklist, they're a design tool. Writing tests first helps think about the API and edge cases.

dx.title: Developer Experience
dx.description: Good DX accelerates development, reduces bugs, and improves team satisfaction. Investment in tooling and standards pays dividends.

philosophy.quote: Excellence in frontend is not just about writing code that works. It's about building systems that scale, that are maintainable, and that empower teams to build with confidence.

contact.title: Contact
contact.description: Interested in collaborating? I'm open to opportunities at Big Tech and high-growth startups.
contact.connectDescription: I'm available for conversations about frontend architecture, technical leadership, or collaboration opportunities. Feel free to reach out.
